thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 20 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Kirkland's Reports Fourth Quarter Sales And Updates 2017 Outlook

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kirkland's Reports Fourth Quarter Sales And Updates 2017 Outlook
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Kirkland’s Inc:
* KIRKLAND‘S REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER SALES AND UPDATES 2017 OUTLOOK
* Q4 SALES $224.6 MILLION VERSUS $203.2 MILLION * ‍KIRKLAND‘S NOW EXPECTS FULL YEAR 2017 DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE IN RANGE OF $0.32 TO $0.34 FOR FY 2017 ​
* ‍EXTRA WEEK IN FISCAL 2017 WAS RESPONSIBLE FOR APPROXIMATELY $10.0 MILLION OF NET SALES DURING Q4​
* KIRKLAND‘S - ‍ON A 13-WEEK COMPARISON, COMPARABLE STORE SALES, INCLUDING E-COMMERCE SALES, INCREASED 2.0% IN Q4 AGAINST A DECLINE OF 4.6% IN PRIOR YEAR​
* ‍STORE TRAFFIC SLOWED IN LATTER HALF OF QUARTER AS CO EXPERIENCED A “FURTHER SHIFT IN HOLIDAY SHOPPING PATTERNS​” Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
